detaileddescription.para:
Save cameras properties to blk file.
blk
- Data Block that contains data to save (see #DataBlock)

Load cameras properties from blk file.
blk
- Data Block that contains data to load (see #DataBlock)

Toggles the display of the Camera settings dialog for all cameras.
parent
- pointer to parent window

briefdescription.para: Closes and deallocates the Camera settings dialog.
